name: Hand Info

inputs.name: Detect
inputs.description: The hand to detect the gesture. Hand 0 represents the first hand appearing in the scene, Hand 1 represents the second hand appearing in the scene.

outputs.name: Rect
outputs.description: The bounding rectangle of the detected hand.

outputs.name: Center Position
outputs.description: The center of the bounding rectangle of the detected hand.

outputs.name: Rotation
outputs.description: The  screen rotation (in radians) of the detected hand vertical axis.

outputs.name: 2D Keypoints
outputs.description: The hand keypoints in a format of the array (use the node “Get Item from Array” to access a specific keypoint position on a face).

outputs.name: Left Hand Probability
outputs.description: Value range from 0 to 1, 0 means 100% right hand, 1 means 100% left hand.

description: Get the properties of a human hand in the camera scene, including the bounding rectangle, center position, rotation, and keypoints of the hand.
